title: I didn't receive the xayah and rakan icon
body: I didn't receive the xayah and rakan icon, I've already checked my notifications

replies.body: There are a lot of players to send these icons too, and we distributed even more today.  You cut it pretty close there, but the icon should be on your account now!
Also, my client has the date listed as 4/27, but I did the gift before 2AM central time.
I'm what you would call a procrastinator. xD
but actually i bought Rakan without knowing about the launch promos and then had to win all the IP to gift someone. D:
same here, I gifted my friend on April 27 but It was before the 2 am deadline
I still haven't received mine either ): I was pretty close to the deadline but I'm not sure anymore
